data.name: Qr_Volumetria_Total
data.queryText:
SELECT 
    YEAR(GETDATE()) AS Ano,
    contatos.totalContatos,
    volumetria.totalSMS,
    volumetria.totalSupermessages,
    volumetria.totalWhatsapp
FROM 
(
    SELECT 
        COUNT(*) AS totalContatos
    FROM (
        SELECT DISTINCT SubscriberKey FROM _Sent
        UNION
        SELECT DISTINCT SubscriberKey FROM _SMSMessageTracking
        UNION
        SELECT DISTINCT SubscriberKey FROM _Subscribers
    ) AS base
) AS contatos
CROSS JOIN 
(
    SELECT
        SUM(qtdSMS) AS totalSMS,
        SUM(qtdSupermessages) AS totalSupermessages,
        SUM(qtdWhatsapp) AS totalWhatsapp
    FROM {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/1d734293-a44b-f011-a5dc-d4f5ef66b01b/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/1d734293-a44b-f011-a5dc-d4f5ef66b01b/data/name}}]
    WHERE MONTH(MesAno) >= 4 OR
    YEAR(GETDATE()) != 2025
) AS volumetria
